subsection.name: Web site
subsection.p: The web site is built with Maven.

li.p: Make sure that currentVersion in project.xml is set propertly.
Optional: Run maven xdoc to build the documentation from the xdocs directory. Check the result at target/docs/index.html. Fix problems and repeat if necessary.
Run maven site to generate the website on your machine. Check the result (in particular: the project reports) at target/docs/index.html. Fix problems and repeat if necessary.

Run maven site:sshdeploy -Dmaven.username=<yourlogin> to upload the website. Uses ssh to transfer the website into a temporary directory and - if successfull - replaces the existing site with a single mv command. If you're asked for an ssh username you probably forgot to specify -Dmaven.username.
